item.title: Christine add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "An <i>errand</i> is getting a tank of gas or picking up a carton of milk or something. It is <i>not</i> getting chased by flying purple pyromaniac gorillas hurling incendiary poo!" -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Christine add a quote by Christine Amsden
item.description: "I've got my own toilet." -- Grace Harper" -- Christine Amsden

item.title: Christine add a quote by Christine Amsden
item.description: "You're a kid. I didn't know we taught kids manners anymore." -- Christine Amsden

item.title: Christine add a quote by Christine Amsden
item.description: "It helps if you donâ€™t think of them as human. More than one officer has called this job pest control." -- Christine Amsden

item.title: Christine add a quote by Christine Amsden
item.description: "My parents think the longer the name, the more powerful the sorcerer, so they named me Cassandra Morgan Ursula Margaret Scot. You can call me Cassie." -- Christine Amsden

item.title: Christine add a quote by Christine Amsden
item.description: "My dad liked to say that magic itself is never black; only the uses to which it is put, but mind magic is already tinted a deep, dark gray." -- Christine Amsden
